title: 'Mortadella' type - On swiss Edition Patrick Frey catalogue cover
content:
Similar to many but not exactly… Any idea?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804233100im_/http:/typophile.com/files/mortadella1_4542.jpg)
author: carlos_moreno_

comments.content: [Cornel Windlin](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804233100/http:/www.editionpatrickfrey.com/en/books/mortadella-christoph-haensli-0) of [Lineto](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804233100/http:/www.lineto/) is credited on book design so may be he designed a bespoke typeface for the occasion.
It seems perfectly plausible… Thanks Ryuk
